name: Mouseherd
description:
Get these mice to their cheese! A short puzzle/action game.

A LUDUM DARE 47 entry.
The theme was "stuck in a loop".
Code+Art+Levels by Sofia Faro (@typeswitch).
Font by João Agostinho (@The_KrOOb).

Updates:

  • 2020-10-04: Game released!
  • 2020-10-05: Fixed a bug in the run stats (best run was not updating correctly).
